No cause it causes too much lose of all the rp they lose.... Honestly if you think about it, I'm not "just making a joke" they give out over 10,000 skins to everyone for free... From their eyes... That's over 100,000 dollars they could earn (ok maybe like 50,000 but still)
But what it does is promote good behaviour among the community. Less toxicity brings more people to the game and surely that's something Rito wants.

{{champion:103}}
Do you get discounted if you have a champ in the bundles
It just lessens the price of the bundle
So...no individual sales on the 'bundled' skins? Guess I'll just buy the single skin that isn't up for sale. Zzz.

Normally we don't put bundled items on individual sale, but due to another sale coming online soon we're changing this one to allow the items to be purchased individually as well. Keep in mind that only the bundle will have the champs for 50% off.
So what's the deal with the bundles, are the skins 30% in total with the bundle or can I buy 1 of the skins separately with the 30% discount?

The skins in the bundle are all 30% off each, along with the champions being 50% off. Normally, bundled items are not put on individual sale but because there is an upcoming early sale for these skins, we will also be placing the skins (not the champs) on individual sale. We'll be updating the post soon.
